roleset.name: to dress
roleset.note: CLOTHE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'clothe' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from clothe.01-v predicate notes)
CLOTHING-N NOTES: Corresponds with clothe.01. Framed by anwen april 2011 (from clothing.01-n)

example.name: with Arg2
example.text: [*-1] Clad in his trademark black velvet suit , [the soft-spoken clarinetist]-1 announced that his new album , `` Inner Voices , '' had just been released [*-9] , that his family was in the front row , and that it was his mother 's birthday , so he was going [*-2] to play her favorite tune from the record .
example.arg: in his trademark black velvet suit

example.name: Args0 and 1
example.text: Jackson's clothing of his infant son was made difficult by his constant squirming.
